decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of five years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (102.P.04, 102.P.05 received 18 February 2014, 102.P.06 received 21 February 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials used for the metal railings (to the front steps and the front boundary) shall match, as at the date of this approval, the existing railings at no.54 Grove Park Terrace (in terms of spread between each rail, colour, height, and design).
description: Listed building consent for the erection of railings to front wall and increase in height of front pillar, creation of new stair way with hand-railings and erection of trellis to side elevation. (00528/52/L2)
